alert.note: Alert for Santa Clarita Valley; Santa Susana Mountains; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 13 at 4:35AM PST until December 13 at 1:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Santa Clarita Valley, Southeastern Ventura County Valleys and Santa Susana Mountains. * WHEN...Until 1 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Santa Clarita Valley; Santa Susana Mountains; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys
